location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 6/44 III Miscellaneous correspondence with the Adviser and deputation of certain personnel to Bahrain State'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 10; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf (Lieutenant-Colonel Arnold Crawshaw Galloway), Political Agency in Bahrain, and the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave). The correspondence concerns the transfer of a report on the agricultural development of Bahrain by Khan Bahadur M Fateh-ud-Din, former Agricultural Expert for the Bahrain Government, between the Adviser and the Political Residency.Folio 9 is internal office notes.
